1=1 AND SR.ENNAME='Student'
AND not exists (select 1 from xmu_project_student s where s.xps_user_id = u.id and s.xps_proj_id =#{xpsProjId})
AND U.OFFICE_ID = #{xpsOfficeId}
AND U.ID in

AND a.xps_office_name LIKE '%'||#{xpsOfficeName}||'%' '%'+#{xpsOfficeName}+'%' concat('%',#{xpsOfficeName},'%')
AND u.name LIKE '%'||#{xpsUserName}||'%' '%'+#{xpsUserName}+'%' concat('%',#{xpsUserName},'%')
AND x.xsi_user_grade LIKE '%'||#{xpuUserGrade}||'%' '%'+#{xpuUserGrade}+'%' concat('%',#{xpuUserGrade},'%')
AND x.xsi_user_profession LIKE '%'||#{xpuUserProfession}||'%' '%'+#{xpuUserProfession}+'%' concat('%',#{xpuUserProfession},'%')
AND x.xsi_user_stuno LIKE '%'||#{xpuUserStuno}||'%' '%'+#{xpuUserStuno}+'%' concat('%',#{xpuUserStuno},'%')
